DOC.brief_summary: This single centre study conduct 3rd hospital affiliate Peking University . Approximately 24 healthy Chinese volunteer , male female , recruit obtain least 20 evaluable volunteer . The primary objective study characterize pharmacokinetics AZD6140 active metabolite AR-C124910XX single multiple ( twice daily ) dose AZD6140 90 mg 180 mg healthy Chinese volunteer . The secondary objective study determine safety tolerability single multiple ( twice daily ) 90 mg 180 mg dos AZD6140 physical examination , clinical laboratory test , vital sign , collection adverse event healthy Chinese volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label , Single Multiple Dose Pharmacokinetic Study 90 mg 180 mg Doses AZD6140 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Chinese ethnicity define parent 4 grandparent Chinese Have normal Body size weigh least 50 kg History diseases condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug determine investigator Current and/or past history intolerance hypersensitivity drug similar chemical structure mechanism action AZD6140 ingredient formulation Symptoms clinically significant illness within 2 week screen A personal family history bleed diatheses reasonable suspicion vascular abnormality include aneurysm
